column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " I think you forgot a couple of things . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " Mother , I think I need some time alone with my family right now . "
#Text=Katara says : " This is your family , Tenzin .
#Text=It 'll be fun .
#Text=" Kya says : " I 'm dying to see that laid back , Vacation Tenzin I 've heard so much about .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " All right , hop on !
#Text=I love you , Mom .
#Text=We 'll see you soon !
#Text=" Korra says : " Do you think I did the right thing ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't know .
#Text=I 'm sorry , but I 'm not very good at this Avatar counseling thing .
#Text=But I know your heart is in the right place .
#Text=You 'll just have to trust it .
#Text=.
#Text=" Unalaq says : " I know this was a hard decision , Korra , but it was the right one .
#Text=Now it is time to put it behind you and begin your new training .
#Text=I have great plans for you .

#Text=" Main Asami Sato Bolin Bumi Korra Kya Mako Tenzin Tonraq Unalaq Antagonists A dark spirit says : " Minor Desna and Eska Engineer Ginger Greenhorn Ikki Jinora Katara Meelo Naga Old salt Pabu Rohan Senna Swami Varrick Zhu Li " Shiro Shinobi says : " After a hundred and seventy years , there are new airbenders in the world and Bumi is one of them !
#Text=So too is the mysterious Zaheer , who escaped from his prison thanks to his new ability .
#Text=Now banished from Republic City , Korra made it her mission to find the new airbenders .
#Text=Will she and Tenzin be able to bring back the Air Nation ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Did someone order a fully equipped Future Industries airship ?
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's perfect !
#Text=Thanks Asami .
#Text=" Asami says : " I figured if we 're going to Ba Sing Se to search for airbenders , we should do it in style .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Yay , airship !
#Text=" Ikki says : " I wan na see !
#Text=" Meelo says : " C'mon , Poki .
#Text=" Kya says : " While you guys are gone , Pema and I will hold down the fort .
#Text=" Kya says : " Who 's excited to spend some time with your Auntie Kya ?
#Text=" Kya says : " Oh !
#Text=" Pema says : " Aw , he likes you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Mako , I 'm so glad you 're here .
#Text=" Mako says : " Of course , Korra .
#Text=Avatar .
#Text=Avatar Korra .
#Text=Once I received your message I proceeded to contact various locations within the Earth Kingdom as ordered by you , the Avatar .
#Text=" Korra says : " Right , the Avatar thanks you for your loyal service .
#Text=Did you find any more leads ?
#Text=" Mako says : " There are reports of airbenders popping up all over the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=I marked the villages on this map .
#Text=You guys can take it with you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Actually , I was kind of hoping you could come , too .
#Text=" Mako says : " Really ?
#Text=Uh , it 's probably better if I sit this one out .
#Text=" Korra says : " I know things have been weird between us since we broke up , but you 're a part of Team Avatar , and we ca n't do this without you .
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm sorry , I ca n't .
#Text=" Pema says : " I 'll miss you , sweetie .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'll miss you too .
#Text=Once we find the airbenders , I 'll send word .
#Text=You can join us at the Northern Air Temple then .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Hey !
#Text=How come Jinora gets to go with you but we do n't ?
#Text=That 's so not fair !
#Text=" Meelo says : " Yeah !
#Text=What this girl said !
#Text=Not fair !
#Text=" Kya says : " Because if airbenders show up here , they 're gon na need some guidance from the two of you .
#Text=It 's a very important job .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Really ?
#Text=Me , a teacher ?
#Text=Yay !
#Text=" Meelo says : " Those maggots will bow to me !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Go easy on them , son .
#Text="
